channel.title: My New Project (Born2Pk)
channel.description:
hey guys, im working on my new project (a pking server) called "Born 2 Pk" im prettymuch just editing a project czar server, to maximize its usage.
im still adding new things, like fixing fight caves by adding more waves + adding more npc's per wave.
if you want to check it out/add any hints, try it out on hamachi(for now)
name: born2pk1 pass:12345 ip: 5.183.232.213
its going well so far, just going to show it off a little :D
so far i have: 100% New Starting Place (unique) 100% Dragon Training Arena 100% 2 New Pking Area's (mage and main) 70% full fight pits/waves 80% most new items. 90% most bonus's 100% full range 100% full melee 97% full ancients (all spells work(exept teleports)) 100% fixed all spells to use proper runes/ammounts of runes.
Pictures: [IMG]http://i293.photobucket.com/albums/mm80/whatthefhk/startingarea.png[/img] [IMG]http://i293.photobucket.com/albums/mm80/whatthefhk/dragons.png[/img] [IMG]http://i293.photobucket.com/albums/mm80/whatthefhk/kalphitequeen-1.png[/img] [IMG]http://i293.photobucket.com/albums/mm80/whatthefhk/firecapewaves.png[/img] [IMG]http://i293.photobucket.com/albums/mm80/whatthefhk/magepk.png[/img] [IMG]http://i293.photobucket.com/albums/mm80/whatthefhk/mainpk.png[/img] [IMG]http://i293.photobucket.com/albums/mm80/whatthefhk/someitems.png[/img]
Looking For Beta Testers (hamachi only)
OWNER: Fighter king = Wild Hunter
spot1: b0ok (admin) spot2: elvemage (admin) spot3: s a n t a pk (admin) spot4: pure gh3tto (admin) spot5: ????(mod) spot6: ????(mod) spot7: open spot8: open spot9: open spot10: open
use this to apply:
name: ingame name: email: timezone:
leave posts about any things you think i should add :D
yours sincerly, w1zz.[br][br][size=1]Posted on: April 16, 2008, 05:36:32 AM[/size][hr]look at this scott.
this is the v3 im releasing tommorow.

hey guys, im working on my new project (a pking server) called “Born 2 Pk”
im prettymuch just editing a project czar server, to maximize its usage.

im still adding new things, like fixing fight caves by adding more waves + adding more npc’s per wave.

if you want to check it out/add any hints, try it out on hamachi(for now)

100% Dragon Training Arena
100% 2 New Pking Area’s (mage and main)

100% fixed all spells to use proper runes/ammounts of runes.
